label: TradeProduct
comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: An additional textual description for this trade product.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The evaluation of an object, such as a product, process, or organization, with respect to the object's worth or condition.
An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a self-declaration.
An unattractive or unsatisfactory characteristic.
A significant word, part of word or phrase that is used to enable indexing of or searching within a textual repository, such as a product catalogue or library.
A permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or to conduct a trade.
Any wrapping or containment, such as a box or a barrel, whether or not any goods are contained within.
A specified period of time.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A process applicable to this specified production cycle.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
A product finishing treatment applied during this production process.
A product tag device to provide protection from a peril such as theft.
A batch identifier for this trade product.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is biologically based.
A brand name, expressed as text, for this experience product.
The party that owns the brand of this trade product.
The brand range name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A buyer assigned identifier of this product batch.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The CITES (Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species) code for this trade product.
The formatted date, time, date time, or other date time value of the cancellation of the announced launch of this trade product.
A product care label specified for this trade product.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A collection identifier of this trade product.
The code specifying the collection status of this trade product.
A textual description of the colour of this trade product.
The code specifying the light source used for colour matching of this trade product.
An identifier of the colour matching sample for this trade product.
A common name, expressed as text, for this distinct chemical.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
A concise textual description for this trade product, such as the description used on a shelf or printed on a receipt.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is configurable.
A consumer age description, expressed as text, for this trade product.
The code specifying the gender of the consumer of this trade product.
A consumer gender description, expressed as text, for this trade product.
The indication of whether or not instances of this trade product have a content variable measure, such as weight, length or volume.
A unique customer assigned identifier for this trade product.
The code specifying the customs statistical classification for this trade product.
The DNA marker identifier of this product batch.
A code specifying a description of this technical characteristic.
A product classification designated for this trade product.
A designation, expressed as text, for this trade product.
The digital platform assigned identifier for this production facility.
The EPC (Electronic Product Code) identifier of this trade product instance.
An end item name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A code specifying a type of end item for this trade product.
An end use product group for this trade product.
An end user party for this trade product.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is for export.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
A textual description of a function for this trade product.
The code specifying the type of function for this trade product.
The code specifying the extent of a genetic modification to this trade product.
A global extension identifier for this trade product, such as a prefix or a suffix.
An included product referenced from this trade product.
An individual instance of this trade product.
A unique industry assigned identifier for this product.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
An intended use, expressed as text, for this photographic picture.
The formatted date, time, date time, or other date time value of the latest change in the product data for this trade product.
The party that owns the legal rights for this trade product.
The code specifying the life cycle stage for this trade product.
A product line, such as a fashion product line, expressed as text, for this trade product.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A sum of money for which something is or may be bought or sold for trade purposes.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
A manufacturer assigned identifier of this product batch.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is marked with a serial number.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A marketing description, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A marketing feature of this trade product.
The model name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A logistics related physical location or place.
A textual description of the physical form of this trade product.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is a piece, such as a piece of fabric.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is pre-packaged.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
A defined way of performing something.
A textual description of the print design for this trade product.
An identifier of the print design for this trade product.
A unique identifier for a product group for this trade product.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value of the discontinuation of the production of this trade product.
The promotional variant identifier for this trade product.
The code specifying the quality level for this trade product.
A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.
The code specifying the type of recycling for this trade product.

An identifier assigned to indicate conformity with a regulation or standard for this trade product, such as "CE" which declares that the product conforms with the essential requirements of the applicable EC directives.
A TT (Track and Trace) animal, such as one kept or raised on a farm or ranch, related to this trade product.
A reference to a physical location or place.

A self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes, such as a box or a barrel which can be filled, partially filled or empty.,A referenced self-contained wrapping or container within which goods can be contained for logistics purposes.
A supply chain trade transaction related to this specified assessment.
The indication of whether or not this trade product is reusable.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
A scientific name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A code specifying a season for this trade product.
A season description, expressed as text, for this trade product.
The code specifying the section for this product print.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A seller assigned identifier of this product batch.
A size description, expressed as text, for this trade product.
The code specifying the species, such as for a plant or animal, of this trade product.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
A colour specified for this trade product.
A production facility specified for this production process.
A product label specified for this trade product.
A photograph or video still represented as a digital image for electronic sharing.
A product print specified for this trade product.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
A product group specified for this trade product.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
The specification of the delivery quantities and delivery date/time values in a supply plan for this trade product.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
The sub-brand name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A subcontractor for this trade party.
The code specifying the subordinate type for this production device.
A textual description of the subordinate type for this trade product.
A referenced product that may substitute for this trade product.
A referenced product substituted for this supply chain trade line item.
The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties, such as population, political organization, etc., used or referenced for trade purposes.
An identifier for a tracking system of this trade product.
A trade name, expressed as text, for this trade product.
A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A textual description of the type for this trade product.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this specified certification.
An ultimate customer assigned extension identifier for this trade product.
A code specifying a type of unit for this trade product.
A textual description of a use of this trade product.
The indication of whether or not instances of this trade product have a variable measure, such as weight, length or volume.
A textual description of a variant of this trade product.
A variant identifier of this trade product.

referencedBy.comment: A product applicable for this subordinate trade line item.
A trade product component of this product batch.
A product included in this supply chain inventory.
An input product applicable to this facility production unit.
An output product applicable to this facility production unit.
The product specified by the requisitioner for this supply chain trade line item.
A product specified for this supply chain trade line item.
